definition: excluded from use or mention, an inhibition or ban resulting from social custom or emotional aversion, declare as sacred and forbidden
details:
adjective
- excluded from use or mention
= synonyms: out
- forbidden to profane use especially in South Pacific islands
= synonyms: tabu
noun
- an inhibition or ban resulting from social custom or emotional aversion
= synonyms: tabu
- something that is forbidden to be used or mentioned in Polynesia and other South Pacific islands because of its sacred nature
= example: something that is forbidden to be used or mentioned in Polynesia and other South Pacific islands because of its sacred nature
= synonyms: tabu
verb
- declare as sacred and forbidden
